summary: ResNetBackbone encapsulates a ResNet-based convolutional neural network serving as a feature extraction backbone. It initializes the ResNet architecture, configures layer depths, and optionally loads pretrained weights to provide hierarchical feature maps for downstream vision models.
business_intent: To supply a ready-to-use, high‑performance visual feature extractor that can be integrated into image classification, object detection, segmentation, and other computer‑vision pipelines, reducing development time and improving model accuracy.
